title: After Factor reset from recovery mode device requests to Verify PIN
content:
I do not remember my PIN and have performed a factory reset.  Afterwards my device during setup requests to verify my previous pin which I do not remember.  I tried using my account email but it does not seem to be accepting the account I set it up with and I am out of options.
Is there a way to reset this device clean where previous pin or account information is not needed or do I have to send device back to Google?

Need help on this please!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
